name: static-extend
description: adds a static `extend` method to a class, to simplify inheritance. extends the static properties, prototype properties, and descriptors from a `parent` constructor onto `child` constructors.
kwds: adds a static `extend` method to a class, to simplify inheritance. extends the static properties, prototype properties, and descriptors from a `parent` constructor onto `child` constructors. class ctor descriptor extend extends inherit inheritance merge method prop properties property prototype
